NPC.name: Avei
NPC.description: This emerald elf is dressed most conservatively in a flowing robe that extends to her ankles. The fabric is old and frayed but was clearly embroidered once, strange symbols showing in faded thread. Even covered by the robe though the curves of her derriere are on display.

missText.text: the villager's punch fails to connect with TARGET

hitText.text: the villager hits TARGET for VALUE points of damage
